references.reason: This paper introduces denoising diffusion probabilistic models (DDPMs), a foundational model for diffusion models which the current paper builds upon.

references.paper_title: Diffusion models beat gans on image synthesis
references.reason: This paper demonstrates the superior performance of diffusion models over generative adversarial networks (GANs) in image synthesis, highlighting the importance of diffusion models in image generation.

references.paper_title: Hierarchical text-conditional image generation with clip latents
references.reason: This paper introduces a hierarchical text-conditional image generation model using CLIP latents, a crucial technique used in many modern text-to-image diffusion models including the one studied in the current paper.

references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This paper introduces Stable Diffusion, a widely used high-resolution image generation model that is used in the experiments of the current paper.

references.paper_title: DPM-Solver: A fast ode solver for diffusion probabilistic model sampling in around 10 steps
references.reason: This paper introduces DPM-Solver, an efficient ODE solver for diffusion models which is used to improve the sampling speed in the experiments of this paper.
